attributes.action: Petition to prohibit petitions advocating the return of capital punishment
attributes.additional_details:
This petition seeks the ban of all petitions seeking to reinstate the barbaric practice of capital punishment in the UK.

The reinstatement of capital punishment by a state which has already banned it is arguably a breach of international human rights law.  The reinstatement of capital punishment in the UK would certainly constitute a fundamental breach of the European Convention on Human Rights, particularly Protocol 13 thereof, which outlaws capital punishment within Europe.  As such, the UK should send a clear signal that epetitions cannot be raised for matters that will only serve to undermine basic human rights and the rule of law.

No more pro-death penalty petitions!
